alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Hendry; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 1:10PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Collier and southwestern Hendry Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 110 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a funnel cloud near Orangetree, or 7 miles north of Golden Gate Estates, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds, winds in excess of 40 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Naples, Ave Maria, Golden Gate Estates, Immokalee, Felda, Orangetree, Golden Gate, Big Corkscrew Island, West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, Vineyards, North Naples, Lely Resort, Naples Park, East Naples, Pelican Bay, Corkscrew Swamp Sanctuary, Sunniland, Picayune Strand State Forest, Bunker Hill and Intersection I-75 And Everglades Blvd. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Hendry; Inland Collier County
